summary: Interior design project management app with projects, rooms, shopping lists, budget tracking, product status workflow, client portal, and task management. User cannot access main app - stuck on sign-in page.
architectural_notes: Core features: project management, room organization, shopping lists, budget tracking
Product workflow: planned → ordered → delivered → installed
Client portal for sharing project details
known_issues: User cannot proceed past sign-in/landing page - no way to access main app functionality

existing_features.title: Fix the authentication flow so users can successfully sign in with Internet Identity and access the main application features (projects, rooms, shopping lists, tasks, etc.) instead of being stuck on the landing page that shows 'Interior Hub Professional project management for interior designers Sign in to manage your projects, clients, and shopping lists'
Ensure the ProfileSetupModal appears automatically for new users who have not completed their profile, and blocks access to main features until profile setup is complete
Verify that the Layout component and main application routes render correctly after authentication state changes from unauthenticated to authenticated
